text: Katerina Balkaba (born 11 June 1982) is a Greek cross-country skier. She competed in two events at the 2002 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Greek female cross- country skiers Category:Olympic cross-country skiers of Greece Category:Cross- country skiers at the 2002 Winter Olympics Category:People from Naousa, Imathia
title: Katerina Balkaba
